    Contact

    Let’s Talk

    Every engagement begins with a conversation. No sales pitch, no pressure. Just an honest discussion about your current challenges and whether we can help.

    Start the Conversation

    The best way to reach us is email:

    dan@boringops.run

    What to Include

    To make our first conversation productive, it helps to share:

    • Your role and decision-making context
    • Team size and structure (engineering, ops, platform)
    • Primary infrastructure (cloud providers, key technologies)
    • Current pain points (incidents, scaling, velocity, on-call burden)
    • What “boring” would look like for your organization
    • Timeline and urgency (exploring vs. active project)

    What Happens Next

    1

    Initial Email Exchange

    We will respond within 1-2 business days with follow-up questions or to schedule a call.

    2

    Discovery Call (30 min)

    Understand your situation, discuss whether there is fit, and explore potential approaches.

    3

    Proposal

    If there is alignment, we will scope an engagement with clear deliverables, timeline, and pricing.

    4

    Kick-off

    Begin the work. Most engagements start within 1-2 weeks of agreement.

    Quick Questions?

    If you just want to ask something quick or are not sure if we can help, email anyway. We are happy to point you in the right direction even if consulting is not the answer.

    The Philosophy Site

    Looking for the BoringOps philosophy, pillars, and articles? That lives at:

    boringops.sh →

    The initial conversation alone gave us clarity we had been missing for months. Even if we had not engaged further, it would have been worth the time.
    CTO — Series A SaaS Company
